column4: i need support to have my xerox printer working ,  now when i am printing a picture of pdf or doc file a bit bigger than some kb it the syslog show an error Apr 19 09:38:45 stevr1it kernel: [116500.672623] type=1502 audit(1240126725.776:82): operation="inode_permission" requested_mask="::rw" denied_mask="::rw" fsuid=7 name="/dev/tty" pid=24177 profile="/usr/sbin/cupsd"  what can I do? I already rinstaleld the drivers fotomatic and original but unsuccesf
ully. I am using intrepid NS WITH UBUNTU 8.04 IT WAS WORKING MARVELLOUSLY. THANK YOU
What model is it?
xerox phaser 6180

try http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/foomatic-db-engine

try uninstalling the current one

ugh, have you tried 9.04?
hmm check the groups your user is a member of

in ubuntu alot of access controls are handled by groups so by modifying what groups you are a member can change your permissions
clear but i am into the user and group, my nick is stevr1it and i don't know what should i change
and moreover, why i can print small documents, and not big with my printer? it has 1.5gb ram installed
my login profile user is connected with the same name group
